China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2023 年 12 月 18 日星期一 05:08:00 GMT 120
Asian fertiliser buyers turn away from key exporter China amid growing curbsAsian fertiliser buyers are seeking alternatives to Chinese supplies on concerns the world's top exporter has become an increasingly unreliable supplier after curbs on shipments to protect its domestic market, buyers and analysts said. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 04:37:27 GMT MYEJ6QQUSJJBXLUHPXEQW4XLRI https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/asian-fertiliser-buyers-turn-away-key-exporter-china-amid-forming-curbs-2023-12-18/Mei Mei Chu, Rajendra Jadhav市场商品
China's economic conditions to improve in 2024 - officialsChina's economy is expected to see more favourable conditions and more opportunities than challenges in 2024, state media said citing officials of the Chinese Communist Party's finance and economy office. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 02:43:49 GMT CHNDRX5J6VMSDF63QMQS6O4GUI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-economic-conditions-improve-2024-officials-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中国
Citigroup China investment bank plans delayed by data law -Bloomberg NewsCitigroup Inc's plan to set up a wholly-owned securities business in China is taking longer than expected because the bank needs more time to comply with the country's data laws, Bloomberg News reported on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 01:38:18 GMT MJPFL3KJKZOVRI2QAA7GSHRWOY https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/citigroup-china-investment-bank-plans-delayed-by-data-law-bloomberg-news-2023-12-18/Reuters商业金融
Taiwan reports more suspected Chinese weather balloons crossing Taiwan StraitTwo suspected Chinese weather balloons flew across the sensitive Taiwan Strait on Sunday but stayed well to the north of Taiwan, the island's defence ministry said on Monday, the second time this month Taipei has reported them nearby. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 01:11:36 GMT F5KTRNHS3ZJJDHP6CDYRPQ53CA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-Detected-two-chinese-balloons-crossing-taiwan-strait-sunday-defence-2023-12-18/Reuters世界亚太地区
Security tight ahead of landmark trial for leading Hong Kong democratA landmark national security trial for leading China critic Jimmy Lai opened in Hong Kong on Monday amid tight security, with the pro-democracy activist battling charges that he colluded with foreign forces, including the United States. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 00:58:29 GMT CZ6LFYDAJ5LKPAV4IDP4B2XIP4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/security-tight-ahead-landmark-Trial-leading-hong-kong-democrat-2023-12-18/Jessie Pang, James Pomfret世界中国
Hong Kong luxury retailers adjusting to drop in high-spending Chinese touristsHong Kong's luxury retailers are adapting to fewer wealthy Chinese shoppers visiting the city and a shift towards tourists flocking to Instagram-coveted spots in trendy districts rather than splashing out on pricey branded gear. Sun, 17 Dec 2023 23:06:10 GMT QA7T3OHG2NLSJH6UWC26H42SGY https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/hong-kong-luxury-retailers- adjustment-drop-high-spending-chinese-tourists-2023-12-17/Farah Master商业零售与消费品
